title: LLMProductView
description: Projection of a Product for LLM edge inference. Contains only fields relevant for relationship discovery. Excludes embeddings, internal metadata, and storage-only fields.

id.description: Product identifier. Used by LLM to reference products in edge patches.

title.description: Human-readable product title. Null if not available.

description.description: Primary semantic text for relationship inference.

brand.description: Brand or manufacturer. Null if not available.

category.description: Primary category label. Null if not available.

price.description: Price value. Null if not available.

currency.description: Currency code. Null if not available.
